question: Which instituition, in association with Shiv Nadar University has developed a new technology to produce Lithium Sulphur Batteries?
explanation:
Researchers at IIT - Bombay and Shiv Nadar University have claimed that they have developed a technology to produce environment friendly Lithium-Sulfur (Li-S) batteries.
The Li-S batteries would be three times more energy efficient and cost effective than conventional Lithium-ion batteries. The production of Li-S batteries uses products from the petroleum industry and agro-waste along with co polymers, and thus has a positive impact on environment.
